segments.text: I see the girl standing there, looking so hopeful as she waits for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her little arm is raised, and her palm is open, like she’s dreaming of that sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been caught doing this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar, balancing precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little sad for her because she’s just standing there, trusting him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, and she has no idea what’s going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t drop the plate or the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a snapshot of childhood mischief and innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a little nostalgic watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also hope they don’t get into too much trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
